alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 19 at 10:33PM EST until February 22 at 1:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of east central New York, including the following county, Warren. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1025 PM EST, Local law enforcement reported Route 418 (River Street) between Hickory Hill Road and River Road is closed in both directions in the adjoining towns of Warrensburg and Thurman due to flooding from an ice jam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
